level.text: Post-hearing briefs shall be filed at the times fixed by the Panel in each case.
The applicant shall brief all issues designated by the Panel in the Report and Order on Pre-hearing Conference and any other issues designated by the Panel during the proceeding.
All post-hearing briefs shall contain a title sheet clearly identifying the parties submitting the brief, including name and title, local address, and local telephone number.
A subject index with page references and a list of all authorities cited, alphabetically arranged with page references, shall be included.
Authorities most heavily relied upon shall be marked with an asterisk. Lengthy quotations from any records or from authorities shall not be included.
The Panel may reject briefs unnecessarily prolix or which do not conform to the rules of the Panel.
